info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 3:13PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Litchfield County through 345 PM EDT... At 313 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over New Preston, or near New Milford, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Heavy rains could cause ponding of water on roadways. Locations impacted include... Torrington, New Milford, Sherman, Thomaston, Litchfield, Northwest Harwinton, Oakville, New Preston, Terryville, Woodbury Center, Gaylordsville, Watertown, Plymouth, Woodbury, Harwinton, Bethlehem, Washington, Morris, Roxbury and Bridgewater. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
